participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and creative, with a passion for music and a love for exploration.
participant_1.background: I am a piano teacher on the side. I enjoy exploring new parts of the city. My father played violin professionally. I play several instruments.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: reflective and somewhat melancholic, dealing with personal challenges while still holding on to his passions.
participant_2.background: My wife left me and took my children. I am overweight and unhappy. I work at a nursing home. I do not believe in God. I spend most of my time on Facebook when I'm not working.
